name: Grappled Caster
text: You have trained to cast spells while wrestling an opponent.
benefit: You gain a +4 bonus on concentration checks to cast spells while grappled. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Combat Casting.
text_zh: 你受过训练如何在擒抱时施法。
benefit_zh: 擒抱时你的施法专注检定获得+4加值。该加值与战斗施法专长赋予的叠加。
